articles.title: BHU Study on Covaxin: Wider data parameters needed to study AESI, says Bharat Biotech - BusinessLine
articles.description: BHU researchers find AESI in one-third of Covaxin recipients, highlighting vaccine safety concerns amid pandemic.
articles.content: Any study on the safety of anti-Covid vaccine, Covaxin, and its Adverse Events of Special Interest (AESI) for individuals who received it should examine a wide range of data to avoid investigator bia… [+1951 chars]
